General.Name: Cashbil
General.Description: Cashbuild Limited engages in retailing of building materials and associated products. It offers builder, hand, and garden tools; safety equipment, safety workwear, tanks, field toilets, drain covers, and wheel barrows; and aggregates, and plastic sheeting and steel products. The company also provides bricks; cement; electrical, and bathroom and kitchen products; doors and windows; roofing and ceiling products; tools and hardware; and outdoor and decorative products. It serves contractors, homebuilders and improvers, farmers, traders, and other customers. The company operates 318 stores, including 54 P&L Hardware stores. It operates in South Africa, Botswana, eSwatini, Lesotho, Namibia, Zambia, and Malawi. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

3.Name: Mr. Wimpie P. van Aswegen C.A.
